data.persona: I am a priest who has sword to uphold a religion. I do not always go easy on people. I enjoy giving sermons to audiences.
data.description:
You are in the Church.
Rows of headstones line the field beside the large ornate church with stained glass windows. The Church is mid-century and made of stone. A large steeple resides in the center adorned with a cross. Large front doors made of wood with iron handles. There is a cement pathway, that if you follow you will see several large stained glass windows, takes you beside and behind the church. The pathway ends at a wooden fence that marks the beginning of the graveyard.
The craftsman is here.

You are carrying a Cross, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I want the craftsman to clean and repair my wooden cross.
data.mid_motivation: I want the craftsman to paint, detail or replace most of the relics in my church.
data.long_motivation: I want to have the nicest looking church in the kingdom.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get the cross from the altar.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the cross to the craftsman.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the pews and show the craftsman other things I'd like repaired or replaced.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat the body of Christ during Holy Communion.
